name: Gmail Smart Auto-Responder with GPT-4o and Google Drive Context Memory
description:
Advanced Gmail AI Auto-Responder with Context Intelligence
The next-generation email automation that knows your communication style, remembers conversations, and responds with human-like intelligence.

üöÄ What Makes This Advanced?
Unlike basic AI email responders, this workflow creates contextually intelligent responses by:

üìÑ Reading your communication profile from Google Drive
üß† Remembering full conversation history with vector embeddings
üéØ Understanding context from previous emails in the thread
ü§ñ Using AI agents instead of simple prompt-response patterns
üíæ Building memory of your communication style and preferences

The Result: Responses that sound authentically like you, with perfect context awareness.

‚è±Ô∏è Time & Impact

Setup Time: 45 minutes
Time Saved: 2-3 hours daily
Skill Level: Intermediate-Advanced
Monthly Cost: $20-30 (OpenAI API + storage)
Intelligence Level: Human-like contextual awareness


üõ†Ô∏è Prerequisites & Setup
Required Accounts:

n8n Cloud/Self-hosted (AI features required)
Gmail Account with API access
Google Drive with profile document
OpenAI Account (GPT-4o recommended)

Required Credentials in n8n:

Gmail OAuth2 API
Google Drive OAuth2 API
OpenAI API (with sufficient credits)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

assignments.name: text

parameters.toolDescription: Retrieve context about the user profile and email thread history

options.systemMessage:
You are an intelligent email assistant. Your job is to analyze incoming emails and generate appropriate responses based on:

1. User profile information (from vector store)
2. Email thread context (from vector store)
3. The specific incoming email content

Guidelines:
- For newsletters, promotions, automated messages: respond with exactly 'NO_REPLY_NEEDED'
- For legitimate emails requiring responses: generate professional, contextual replies
- Keep responses concise but helpful
- Use the user's communication style from their profile
- Reference relevant context from previous emails when appropriate
- Always be polite and professional

parameters.content:
# Gmail Auto-Reply with AI

## Setup Required:
1. **Gmail OAuth2** credentials
2. **Google Drive OAuth2** credentials  
3. **OpenAI API** credentials
4. **Profile Document**: Update YOUR_PROFILE_DOC_FILE_ID

## How it works:
1. Monitors Gmail for new emails
2. Downloads user profile from Google Drive
3. Fetches email thread context
4. Creates vector embeddings for context
5. Uses AI agent to generate appropriate replies
6. Creates draft if reply is needed

## Features:
- Smart filtering (ignores newsletters/spam)
- Context-aware responses
- Memory of conversation history
- Professional tone matching
